TopicTitle: What the heck is the "Launch Site"?

Articles.Content:
![tWYKER2.png](http://i.imgur.com/tWYKER2.png)

So, I got a contract asking me to test the "Thud" at the "launch site". Built a ship with it, assuming the Launch site was the launchpad... but nothing.

I'm confused. Is this a bug? Something I missed?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T18:39:10Z" title="04/28/2015 06:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Starwhip**

I'm a dumbass, the new nicknames confused me. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Thought the "Thud" was the LV-T30...

Case closed. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
